decks.notes: The focus of this Dimir Control deck is to disrupt the opponent's strategy through a combination of removal spells, counterspells, and mill effects. Thieves' Guild Enforcer and Ruin Crab provide early-game pressure while Soaring Thought-Thief boosts the evasion of the creatures. The deck aims to control the board with cards like Drown in the Loch and Heartless Act, while drawing cards with Into the Story. The deck also utilizes Lurrus of the Dream-Den as a companion for additional value. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent and win the game through card advantage and disruption.

The main goal of this deck is to mill the opponent's deck by controlling the board through counterspells, removal, and creatures that enhance the mill strategy. With cards like Ruin Crab and Soaring Thought-Thief, the deck aims to fill the opponent's graveyard quickly while disrupting their game plan. By using cards like Drown in the Loch, Mystical Dispute, and Into the Story, the deck can control the pace of the game and outvalue the opponent. Overall, the strategy revolves around milling the opponent's deck while controlling the game state.

The key concept of this Jeskai Combo deck is to utilize Vadrok, Apex of Thunder and Lore Drakkis to repeatedly cast powerful spells from the graveyard, while also generating extra mana and card advantage with Goldspan Dragon. The deck aims to control the board with removal spells like Burning Hands and Spikefield Hazard, while also disrupting the opponent with counterspells like Negate and Mystical Dispute. The combination of card advantage, efficient removal, and powerful creatures allows the deck to overwhelm opponents and win the game through explosive combos.

The deck focuses on playing a fast and aggressive strategy to quickly bring out powerful creatures like Winota, Joiner of Forces, and Blade Historian to overwhelm the opponent and deal massive amounts of damage. By utilizing cards like Lotus Cobra and Jaspera Sentinel to ramp up mana, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early and maintain board presence with token generators like Magda, Brazen Outlaw and Esika's Chariot. The inclusion of cards like Kenrith, the Returned King and Elite Spellbinder provides additional utility and disruption to keep the opponent off balance.

This deck focuses on utilizing the companion Yorion, Sky Nomad to create a synergistic aggro strategy with a mix of high value creatures and removal spells. The deck aims to generate card advantage and tempo by blinking key permanents with Yorion and maintaining board control with cards like Skyclave Apparition and Elite Spellbinder. The inclusion of powerful cards like The Great Henge and Kaya the Inexorable helps to further solidify the deck's aggressive game plan while also providing additional utility and resilience against opposing strategies.

This deck focuses on putting pressure on your opponent with aggressive creatures like Feasting Troll King, Wicked Wolf, and Lovestruck Beast. The key strategy is to quickly ramp up your mana with cards like Gilded Goose and Kazandu Mammoth to cast powerful spells like Embercleave and The Great Henge. Utilizing cards like Trail of Crumbs and Witch's Oven for card advantage and The Akroan War to disrupt your opponent's board state, this deck aims to overwhelm your opponent with a strong board presence and efficient use of resources.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy using powerful creatures like Questing Beast and Lovestruck Beast. It also includes cards like Gemrazer and Stonecoil Serpent for additional flexibility and utility. The deck aims to build a strong board presence quickly to apply pressure and control the game early on, utilizing cards like The Great Henge and Ranger Class for extra advantage. With a strong mix of creatures and spells, this Mono Green Aggro deck aims to dominate the battlefield and secure a swift victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing powerful creatures and spells to put pressure on opponents quickly and efficiently. By combining aggressive creatures like Bonecrusher Giant and Lovestruck Beast with versatile spells like Brazen Borrower and Burning Hands, the deck aims to control the battlefield and deal damage as early as possible. The deck also includes card draw and ramp options like Edgewall Innkeeper and Llanowar Visionary to maintain resources and ensure a steady stream of threats. Lukka, Coppercoat Outcast is used to cheat out high-value creatures like Koma, Cosmos Serpent for extra advantage.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by disrupting the opponent's strategy and card advantage using cards like Thieves' Guild Enforcer, Soaring Thought-Thief, Ruin Crab, and Into the Story. The deck also includes removal spells like Power Word Kill, Mystical Dispute, and Heartless Act to deal with threats. The mana base is carefully chosen to ensure consistent access to the necessary colors of mana for casting spells. The inclusion of Lurrus of the Dream-Den as a companion provides additional value by allowing the player to recast low-cost permanents from their graveyard.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying a strong board presence through efficient creatures and combat tricks, while also utilizing powerful red-green cards to close out the game swiftly. By combining aggressive creatures like Bonecrusher Giant and Lovestruck Beast with powerful equipment like Embercleave, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize. The inclusion of cards like Goldspan Dragon and Magda, Brazen Outlaw also provide additional value and potential for explosive turns. Overall, this deck is designed to apply constant pressure and outpace the opponent in the early game.

The main focus of this mono green aggro deck is to rapidly deploy powerful creatures and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. The deck includes a mix of efficient creatures like Questing Beast and Lovestruck Beast, alongside versatile spells like Primal Might and Blizzard Brawl to maintain board control. The inclusion of cards like Gemrazer and The Great Henge provide additional value and resilience to the deck. Overall, this deck aims to quickly establish board presence and apply pressure to the opponent through its aggressive plays.

This Sultai Control deck focuses on utilizing powerful control spells and board wipes to maintain dominance over the opponent. With cards like Shadows' Verdict, Heartless Act, and Extinction Event, the deck can efficiently deal with threats on the board. The inclusion of Emergent Ultimatum and Alrund's Epiphany provides the player with versatile win conditions and card advantage. The deck also includes powerful planeswalkers like Professor Onyx for additional control options. By using these cards in conjunction with Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent in a game of attrition.

The concept of this control deck revolves around utilizing powerful removal spells, counterspells, and card advantage engines to control the game and slow down the opponent's strategy. With a focus on ramping up mana with cards like Cultivate and Emergent Ultimatum, the deck aims to play big threats like Vorinclex, Monstrous Raider and Elder Gargaroth, while also using Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion for additional value. By disrupting the opponent's game plan with removal and counterspells, the deck seeks to outvalue and outlast opponents in a longer game.

This deck focuses on utilizing efficient creatures such as Bonecrusher Giant, Lovestruck Beast, and Edgewall Innkeeper to apply pressure on the opponent quickly. Lukka, Coppercoat Outcast helps to cheat out bigger threats like Koma, Cosmos Serpent while also synergizing with the deck's creature base. The deck aims to maintain a consistent board presence while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Mystical Dispute and The Akroan War. With a good balance of aggressive creatures and control elements, this deck can overwhelm opponents and secure a fast victory.

This deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a fast and aggressive strategy, utilizing strong creatures and versatile spells to maintain board presence and pressure. The deck includes a mix of powerful creatures like Koma, Cosmos Serpent and Lovestruck Beast, alongside efficient removal spells like Bonecrusher Giant and Brazen Borrower. Lukka, Coppercoat Outcast serves as a key engine for swapping out smaller creatures for bigger threats, while disruptive spells like Disdainful Stroke and The Akroan War help control the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck seeks to quickly establish dominance and push for a swift victory.

This deck focuses on quickly building a board presence and overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures. Winota, Joiner of Forces is the key card that allows you to cheat powerful creatures onto the battlefield and generate additional value. Supporting cards like Minsc, Beloved Ranger and Elite Spellbinder help control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also includes ramp elements with Lotus Cobra and Prosperous Innkeeper to ensure you can cast your big threats quickly. The goal is to apply pressure early and maintain it throughout the game to secure a victory.
